about_the_game:
"The Feudal" is a card strategy game set in a medieval setting, with additional text quests and original design.

Each of the two decks provides two choices, and all subsequent cards after that choice affect one of the four resources more significantly, while the others are affected to a lesser extent. So, after choosing one of the two decks, you're essentially selecting one of two branches—there are four branches in total. To gain access to the other deck, you need to pick the second option in the dialogue on almost every card, except for the first ones.

Alongside this, some cards (almost all of them by release) will unlock access to story-driven text quests, where you'll be able to get to know the main character and the other characters that influence their fate.
detailed_description:
"The Feudal" is a card strategy game set in a medieval setting, with additional text quests and original design.

Each of the two decks provides two choices, and all subsequent cards after that choice affect one of the four resources more significantly, while the others are affected to a lesser extent. So, after choosing one of the two decks, you're essentially selecting one of two branches—there are four branches in total. To gain access to the other deck, you need to pick the second option in the dialogue on almost every card, except for the first ones.

Alongside this, some cards (almost all of them by release) will unlock access to story-driven text quests, where you'll be able to get to know the main character and the other characters that influence their fate.
name: The Feudal

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-2120 / AMD® FX 6350
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 660 (2GB) / AMD® Radeon™ HD 7870 (2GB) / Intel® Iris Pro™ 580 / Intel® Iris® Plus G7 / AMD® Radeon™ Vega 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4670K / AMD® Ryzen™ 5 2400G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 1650 (4GB) / AMD® Radeon™ R9 390X (8GB)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: It is a card game in the medieval setting, where you play a role of a feudal, manage your settlement, protect it and help the peasants resolve their problems.
